document_data.name: ''Pearl of the Sirines''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''pearl of the sirines''''' was a [[magic item]] capable of granting wondrous powers related to the sea to its wielder.
document_data.Description: Regardless of their magical enchantments, these beautiful [[pearl]]s were worth at least 1,000 [[gp]].
document_data.Powers:
This item granted the wielder the ability to breathe underwater as if they were breathing clean air and swim at an incredible rate while underwater, and also protected the wielder from a [[sirine]]'s poison.

To unlock and understand the powers of the ''pearl of the sirines'', the wielder needed to clutch the pearl tightly and perform any action related to the pearl's powers.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Khalil]], a [[half-elven]] [[sha'ir]] who sailed the [[Great Sea]] near [[Zakhara]], carried a ''pearl of the sirines''.
